org.rrd4j.core

Class RrdMongoDBBackendFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rrd4j.core.RrdBackendFactory
      • org.rrd4j.core.RrdMongoDBBackendFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @RrdBackendAnnotation(name="MONGODB",
                      shouldValidateHeader=false)
public class RrdMongoDBBackendFactory
extends RrdBackendFactory
    RrdBackendFactory that uses MongoDB for data storage. Construct a MongoDB DBCollection or MongoCollection and pass it via the constructor.
    Author:
    Mathias Bogaert

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • RrdMongoDBBackendFactory

        @Deprecated
public RrdMongoDBBackendFactory(DBCollection rrdCollection)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a RrdMongoDBBackendFactory. Make sure that the passed DBCollection has a safe write concern, is capped (if needed) and slaveOk() called if applicable. The backend will be registered as the default.
        Parameters:
        rrdCollection - the collection to use for storing RRD byte data

      • RrdMongoDBBackendFactory

        @Deprecated
public RrdMongoDBBackendFactory(DBCollection rrdCollection,
                                            boolean registerAsDefault)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a RrdMongoDBBackendFactory. Make sure that the passed DBCollection has a safe write concern, is capped (if needed) and slaveOk() called if applicable.
        Parameters:
        rrdCollection - the collection to use for storing RRD byte data
        registerAsDefault - if true, the backend will be registered as the default

      • RrdMongoDBBackendFactory

        public RrdMongoDBBackendFactory(MongoClient client,
                                com.mongodb.client.MongoCollection<DBObject> rrdCollection,
                                boolean registerAsDefault)
        Creates a RrdMongoDBBackendFactory. Make sure that the passed MongoClient has a safe write concern, is capped (if needed) and slaveOk() called if applicable.
        Parameters:
        client - the client connection
        rrdCollection - the collection to use for storing RRD byte data
        registerAsDefault - if true, the backend will be registered as the default

      • resolve

        protected URI resolve(URI rootUri,
                      URI uri,
                      boolean relative)
        Description copied from class: RrdBackendFactory
        Try to match an URI against a root URI using a few rules:
        • scheme must match if they are given.
        • authority must match if they are given.
        • if uri is opaque (scheme:nonabsolute), the scheme specific part is resolve as a relative path.
        • query and fragment is kept as is.
        Overrides:
        resolve in class RrdBackendFactory
        Returns:
        a calculate normalized absolute URI or null if the tried URL don't match against the root.

      • canStore

        public boolean canStore(URI uri)
